Verses: 1 andriyum, Balamullavargalaagiya Naam Namakke Piriyamaai Nadavaamal, Balaveenarudaiya Balaveenangalaith Thaangavendum.
2 nammil Ovvoruvanum Piranudaiya Bakthiviruththikkedhuvaana Nanmaiyundaagumpadi Avanukkup Piriyamaai Nadakkakkadavan.
3 kiristhuvum Thamakke Piriyamaai Nadavaamal: Ummai Nindhikkiravargaludaiya Nindhaigal Enmel Vizhundhadhu Endru Ezhudhiyirukkirapadiye Nadandhaar.
4 dhevavasanaththinaal Undaagum Porumaiyinaalum Aarudhalinaalum Naam Nambikkaiyullavargalaagumpadikku, Munbu Ezhudhiyirukkiravaigalellaam Namakkup Podhanaiyaaga Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
5 neengal Orumanappattu Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanai Ore Vaayinaal Magimaippaduththumpadikku,
6 porumaiyaiyum Aarudhalaiyum Alikkum Dhevan, Kiristhu Yesuvinudaiya Maadhiriyinpadiye, Neengal Egasindhaiyullavargalaayirukkumpadi Ungalukku Anukgirakanjseyvaaraaga.
7 aadhalaal Dhevanukku Magimaiyundaaga, Kiristhu Nammai Etrukkondadhupola, Neengalum Oruvaraiyoruvar Etrukkollungal.
8 melum, Pidhaakkalukkup Pannappatta Vaakkuththaththangalai Urudhiyaakkumpadikku, Dhevanudaiya Saththiyaththinimiththam Yesukiristhu Viruththasedhanamullavargalukku Oozhiyakkaararaanaarendrum;

9 purajaadhiyaarum Irakkampetradhinimiththam Dhevanai Magimaippaduththugiraargalendrum Sollugiren. Andhappadi: Idhinimiththam Naan Purajaadhigalukkulle Ummai Arikkaipanni, Ummudaiya Naamaththaich Solli, Sangeedham Paaduven Endru Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
10 melum, Purajaadhigale, Avarudaiya Janangalodekoodak Kalikoorungal Engiraar.
11 melum, Purajaadhigale, Ellaarum Karththaraith Thudhiyungal; Janangale, Ellaarum Avaraip Pugazhungal Endrum Sollugiraar.
12 melum, Eesaayin Verum Purajaadhiyaarai Aalumpadikku Ezhumbugiravarumaagiya Oruvar Thondruvaar; Avaridaththil Purajaadhiyaar Nambikkai Vaippaargal Endru Esaayaa Sollugiraan.

13 parisuththa Aaviyin Balaththinaale Ungalukku Nambikkai Perugumpadikku, Nambikkaiyin Dhevan Visuvaasaththinaal Undaagum Ellaavidha Sandhoshaththinaalum Samaadhaanaththinaalum Ungalai Nirappuvaaraaga.

14 en Sagodharare, Neengal Nargunaththinaal Niraindhavargalum, Sagala Arivinaalum Nirappappattavargalum, Oruvarukkoruvar Buththisolla Vallavargalumaayirukkireergalendru Naanum Ungalaik Kuriththu Nichchayiththirukkiren;

15 appadiyirundhum, Sagodharare, Purajaadhiyaaraagiya Bali Parisuththa Aaviyinaale Parisuththamaakkappattu, Dhevanukkup Piriyamaana Baliyaagumpadikku, Naan Dhevanudaiya Suvisesha Oozhiyaththai Nadaththum Aasaariyanaayirundhu Purajaadhigalukku Yesukiristhuvinudaiya Oozhiyakkaaranaagumporuttu,
16 dhevan Enakku Aliththa Kirubaiyinaale Ungalukku Gnaabagappaduththumpadikku Ivaigalai Naan Adhiga Dhairiyamaai Ezhudhinen.
17 aadhalaal Naan Dhevanukkuriyavaigalaik Kuriththu Yesukiristhuvaikkondu Menmaipaaraatta Enakku Idamundu.

18 purajaadhiyaarai Vaarththaiyinaalum Seygaiyinaalum Keezhppadiyappannumpadikku, Arpudha Adaiyaalangalin Balaththinaalum, Dheva Aaviyin Balaththinaalum, Kiristhuvaanavar Ennaikkondu Nadappiththavaigalai Solvadhallaamal Verondraiyum Solla Naan Thunivadhillai;
19 ippadi Erusalem Thuvakkich Sutrilum, Illirikkam Thesamvaraikkum, Kiristhuvin Suviseshaththaip Pooranamaaip Pirasangiththirukkiren.
20 melum Avarudaiya Seydhiyai Ariyaadhirundhavargal, Kaanbaargalendrum, Kelvippadaadhirundhavargal Unarndhukolvaargalendrum Ezhudhiyirukkirapadiye,
21 naan Matroruvanudaiya Asthibaaraththinmel Kattaadhapadikku Kiristhuvinudaiya Naamam Sollappattiraadha Idangalil Suviseshaththai Arivikkumpadi Naadugiren.
22 ungalidaththil Varugiradharku Idhinaale Anegandharam Thadaipatten.
23 ippozhudhu Indhath Thisaigalile Enakku Idamillaadhapadiyinaalum, Ungalidaththil Varumpadi Anega Varushamaai Enakku Migundha Viruppam Undaayirukkirapadiyinaalum,

24 naan Spaaniyaa Dhesaththirkup Pirayaanampannugaiyil Ungalidaththil Vandhu, Ungalaik Kandukollavum, Ungalidaththil Satruth Thirupthiyadaindhapinbu, Avvidaththirku Ungalaal Vazhivittanuppappadavum, Enakku Samayang Kidaikkumendru Nambiyirukkiren.
25 ippozhudho Parisuththavaangalukku Udhaviseyyunkaariyamaaga Naan Erusalemukkup Pirayaanampanna Eththanamaayirukkiren.
26 makkedhoniyaavilum Agaayaavilumullavargal Erusalemilulla Parisuththavaangalukkulle Irukkira Thariththirarukkaagach Sila Porulsagaayam Seyya Viruppankondirukkiraargal;

27 ippadichseyvadhu Nalladhendru Enninaargal; Ippadich Seygiradharku Avargal Kadanaaligalaayumirukkiraargal. Eppadiyendraal, Purajaadhiyaar Avargaludaiya Gnaanananmaigalil Pangupetrirukka, Sareerananmaigalaal Avargalukku Udhaviseyya Ivargal Kadanaaligalaayirukkiraargale.
28 indhak Kaariyaththai Naan Niraivetri, Indhap Balanai Avargal Kaiyile Baththiramaai Oppuviththapinbu, Ungal Oor Vazhiyaai Spaaniyaavukkup Poven.
29 naan Ungalidaththil Varumbodhu Kiristhuvinudaiya Suviseshaththin Sambooranamaana Aaseervaadhaththode Varuvenendru Arindhirukkiren.
30 melum Sagodharare, Dhevasiththaththinaale Naan Sandhoshaththudane Ungalidaththil Vandhu Ungalodu Ilaippaarumpadiyaaga,
31 yoodheyaavilirukkira Avisuvaasigalukku Naan Thappuvikkappadumpadikkum, Naan Erusalemilulla Parisuththavaangalukku Seyyappogira Dharmasagaayam Avargalaal Angigarikkappadumpadikkum,

32 neengal Dhevanai Nokki Seyyum Jebangalil, Naan Poraaduvadhupola Neengalum Ennodukoodap Poraadavendumendru Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinimiththamum, Aaviyaanavarudaiya Anbinimiththamum, Ungalai Vendikkollugiren.
33 samaadhaanaththin Dhevan Ungal Anaivarodunkooda Iruppaaraaga. Aamen.
